com.ulflander.minethat.model
Class Chapter

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.minethat.model.Text
      com.ulflander.minethat.model.Chapter

public class Chapter
extends Text

A chapter contains paragraphs and is contained into a document.

Since:
2/24/14
Author:
Ulflander

getSentenceAt

public final Sentence getSentenceAt(int paragraphPos,
                                    int pos)
Get sentence at given paragraph index and sentence index - WILL throw an exception if paragraph does not exist.

Parameters:
paragraphPos - Index of paragraph
pos - Index of sentence in paragraph
Returns:
Sentence if exist, null otherwise, throws error if paragraph does not exist

getTokenAt

public final Token getTokenAt(int paragraphPos,
                              int sentencePos,
                              int pos)
Get token at given paragraph index and sentence index and token index - WILL throw an exception if paragraph or sentence does not exist.

Parameters:
paragraphPos - Index of paragraph
sentencePos - Index of sentence in paragraph
pos - Index of token in sentence
Returns:
Token if exist, null otherwise, throws error if paragraph or sentence does not exist
